description: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists all the parts of all the partitions of n, in graded colexicographic ordering.
comments: This is also a list of all the possible prime signatures of a number, arranged in graded colexicographic ordering. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 09 2014
links: OEIS Wiki, Orderings of partitions (a comparison).
crossrefs: See A036036 for the "Abramowitz and Stegun" (graded reflected colexicographic) ordering. - Daniel Forgues, Jan 20 2011
See A080576 for the Maple (graded reflected lexicographic) ordering. - Daniel Forgues, Jan 20 2011
See A080577 for the Mathematica (graded reverse lexicographic) ordering. - Daniel Forgues, Jan 20 2011
See A228100 for the Fenner-Loizou (binary tree) ordering.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
